full_summary:
==========================================

**ACAN Online Electromechanical Technician Certificate Training**
==============================================================

### Tender Notification Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3848541489
* **Publication Date**: January 31, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 14, 2023, 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 15, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: February 14, 2024

### Tender Information

This tender is a **Advance Contract Award Notice**, valued at an estimated [value to be determined]. The procurement method is a **Single-Source Request for Proposal**. 

The **Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement**, **Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement**, and **World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)** are applicable to this tender.

The **Minister of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)** is the **Contracting Entity**, with the **Department of National Defence (DND)** as the **End User**.

### Contact Information

* **Point of Contact**: Shannon Brewster, PSPC
* **Email**: [shannon.brewster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shannon.brewster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15266691?extsite=MTUyNjY2OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15266691?extsite=MTUyNjY2OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Important Notice

Please note that an amendment has been made to the tender closing time. The Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time have been disregarded. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on or before February 14, 2023, 14:00 EST. Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.
